Author: Azaryxe
Text: When reintroducing foods, start with soft foods like soups, smoothies, overcooked vegetables. The pain is because your stomach is out of practice digesting solids. Also try not to go too fibre heavy. The more you  increase what you're allowing yourself, the more those side effects will sunside. It really is a bitch at times, I know I questioned if it was worth the hassle (yes, it is).
